applicant-name.name: XIAMEN SHENGMATE NEW ENERGY RES INSTITUTE CO LTD
厦门市圣码特新能源研究院有限公司

invention-title: Hydrogen energy wall-mounted hydrogen charging device for underground parking lot and magnetic attraction type hydrogen charging method of hydrogen energy wall-mounted hydrogen charging device
一种用于地下停车场的氢能挂墙充氢装置及其磁吸式充氢方法

abstract.p: The invention provides a hydrogen energy wall-mounted hydrogen charging device for an underground parking lot and a magnetic type hydrogen charging method of the hydrogen energy wall-mounted hydrogen charging device, and belongs to the technical field of hydrogen charging devices. The problems of long hydrogen charging time, large equipment area and the like of an existing hydrogen charging mode for the hydrogen energy electric vehicle are solved; comprising a hydrogen generation device, a hydrogen storage device and a hydrogen reaction device which are movably mounted in a wall-hung mode, the hydrogen generation device is used for generating hydrogen and transmitting the hydrogen to the hydrogen storage device for high-density hydrogen storage, and the hydrogen reaction device is used for efficiently releasing the hydrogen stored in the hydrogen storage device when needed; the hydrogen generation device comprises a hydrogenase reactor, a temperature regulator and a hydrogen purification device, the hydrogenase reactor generates hydrogen through built-in water and hydrogenase, and the activity of the hydrogenase and the reaction rate of hydrogen production are controlled in real time through the temperature regulator; the hydrogen purification device is used for filtering and purifying hydrogen generated by the hydrogenase reactor and then transmitting the hydrogen to the hydrogen storage device; the device is applied to hydrogen charging of the hydrogen energy automobile.

本发明提供了一种用于地下停车场的氢能挂墙充氢装置及其磁吸式充氢方法，属于充氢装置技术领域；解决了现有用于氢能电动汽车的充氢方式存在充氢时间长、设备面积大等问题；包括可移动挂墙安装的氢发生装置、氢存储装置和氢反应装置，氢发生装置用于产生氢气并将其传输至氢存储装置进行高密度氢气的存储，氢反应装置用于在需要时将存储在氢存储装置中的氢气进行高效释放；氢发生装置包括氢化酶反应器、温度调节器和氢气提纯装置，氢化酶反应器通过内置的水和氢化酶产生氢气，并通过温度调节器实时控制氢化酶的活性和产氢的反应速率，氢气提纯装置用于将氢化酶反应器产生的氢气过滤提纯后传输至氢存储装置；本发明应用于氢能源汽车充氢。
